description: The Passage series is a versatile surf staple in Roark’s line, now constructed with Hemp Blend 4-Way Stretch. The fabled Sierra Madre de Oaxaca mountain range was where the Roark crew began this season’s journey, weaving through tiny, traditional villages on motorbike, sampling mezcals in hidden festivals perched in towns above the clouds.
name: Roark Passage Sierra Madre Boardshorts, 18" Inseam - Mens
